Name: Abel
description:
Abel is a married man with six children who operates a wholesale shop in Hoima, Uganda. For extra income Abel carries out farming of mainly cassava and beans. On realizing the need for complementing his wifeâ€™s earnings, he ventured into business in 2012 to generate more income. 

His business is exposed to high rental fees, yet he desires to have a well-stocked business in town that will increase his capital base. 

Abel is requesting a loan to buy stock like books, sugar and salt to sell.
